  • Packages that use HttpConnectionManager 
    Package Description
    edu.internet2.middleware.grouperClientExt.org.apache.commons.httpclient
    Classes and interfaces supporting the client side of the HTTP protocol.
    edu.internet2.middleware.grouperClientExt.org.apache.commons.httpclient.util
    Provides some utility classes for use by HttpClient.
